message_1:
Decrypt the following Rail fence cipher: 

HEOLWLDR!LO   (Use a rail fence key of 3)
message_2:
To decrypt the Rail fence cipher with a key of 3, we will arrange the letters in the following pattern:

H . . . O . . . L
. E . L . W . D .
. . R . . . ! . .

Now, read the letters row by row:

HELLO WORLD!

The decrypted message is "HELLO WORLD!".
